content: On October 16, a mother made a real-name report on Bilibili about bullying in the military. She said that her child, after graduating from college and joining the army, was subjected to long-term beatings, humiliation and abuse by officers. He attempted suicide twice and was hospitalized twice. Finally, he was driven crazy and admitted to a mental hospital.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
50 years ago, Marx's followers kicked the ball of Confucius' descendants on the head
50 years later, Confucius' followers clamored to exterminate the Jews
And now, they want to combine
What is the second combination?
Whose suit is Marx?
Why can a theoretical film make everyone laugh at the same time?
Teacher Li takes you to watch "When Marx Met Confucius" [Teacher Li is not your teacher]

One Belt One Road, close your own road first
Beijing citizens submitted a letter saying that on October 17, Beijing held the One Belt One Road Summit, and road control and various road closures blocked thousands of people during the morning rush hour. There was a row of armed police at the bus stop, and the overpass was also closed last night.

Formalism reaches new heights
Recently, Liaoning University of International Business and Economics announced that every Wednesday will be formal dress day, requiring students to wear formal clothes
A middle school in Guangzhou requires girls to wear pure white leggings to school, otherwise they will be deducted points.

The high schoolization of universities is in progress
On October 15, the School of Mechanical and Electrical Engineering of Wuhan University of Technology announced the implementation of the "Four Mornings, Two Nights, One Opposition" work plan
Require all freshmen to study in the morning and evening, not to play games at night, etc., and encourage students to report.
Violators will be treated as absenteeism.

content: CCTV said that about one-third of Chinese people do not sleep well, and nearly 70% of them sleep late due to mobile phones. This triggered ridicule from netizens: implementing the labor law would be more helpful.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On October 16, the military family compound on Taiping Road in Haidian District, Beijing was vacated.
On-site security, special police and soldiers held shields to prevent residents from returning home, forcibly moved out the furniture and belongings of retired soldiers and their families, and drove away and beat the residents.
In the video, a woman wearing a party emblem was knocked to the ground.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: It is reported that the property rights of such old houses often belong to the barracks office and are dormitories for the families of junior officers. With the transfer and retirement of junior officers, they have gradually been vacated in recent years.
